12 active_ = False

14 pub_ = None
15 regions_ = {
16  'right': 0,
17  'fright': 0,
18  'front': 0,
19  'fleft': 0,
20  'left': 0,

22 state_ = 0

24  0: 'find the wall',
25  1: 'turn left',
26  2: 'follow the wall',

30 def wall_follower_switch(req):
31  global active_
32  active_ = req.data
33  res = SetBoolResponse()
34  res.success = True
35  res.message = 'Done!'
36  return res

39 def clbk_laser(msg):
40  global regions_
41  regions_ = {
42  'right': min(min(msg.ranges[0:143]), 10),
43  'fright': min(min(msg.ranges[144:287]), 10),
44  'front': min(min(msg.ranges[288:431]), 10),
45  'fleft': min(min(msg.ranges[432:575]), 10),
46  'left': min(min(msg.ranges[576:713]), 10),
47  }
48 
49  take_action()
50 
51 
52 def change_state(state):
53  global state_, state_dict_
54  if state is not state_:
55  print ('Wall follower - [%s] - %s' % (state, state_dict_[state]))
56  state_ = state
57 
58 
59 def take_action():
60  global regions_
61  regions = regions_
62  msg = Twist()
63  linear_x = 0
64  angular_z = 0
65  state_description = ''
66 
67  d0 = 0.5
68  d = 0.75
69 
70  if regions['front'] > d0 and regions['fleft'] > d and regions['fright'] > d:
71  state_description = 'case 1 - nothing'
72  change_state(0)
73  elif regions['front'] < d0 and regions['fleft'] > d and regions['fright'] > d:
74  state_description = 'case 2 - front'
75  change_state(1)
76  elif regions['front'] > d0 and regions['fleft'] > d and regions['fright'] < d:
77  state_description = 'case 3 - fright'
78  change_state(2)
79  elif regions['front'] > d0 and regions['fleft'] < d and regions['fright'] > d:
80  state_description = 'case 4 - fleft'
81  change_state(0)
82  elif regions['front'] < d0 and regions['fleft'] > d and regions['fright'] < d:
83  state_description = 'case 5 - front and fright'
84  change_state(1)
85  elif regions['front'] < d0 and regions['fleft'] < d and regions['fright'] > d:
86  state_description = 'case 6 - front and fleft'
87  change_state(1)
88  elif regions['front'] < d0 and regions['fleft'] < d and regions['fright'] < d:
89  state_description = 'case 7 - front and fleft and fright'
90  change_state(1)
91  elif regions['front'] > d0 and regions['fleft'] < d and regions['fright'] < d:
92  state_description = 'case 8 - fleft and fright'
93  change_state(2)
94  else:
95  state_description = 'unknown case'
96  rospy.loginfo(regions)
97  print(state_description)
98 
99 
100 def find_wall():
101  msg = Twist()
102  msg.linear.x = 0.2
103  msg.angular.z = -0.3
104  return msg
105 
106 
107 def turn_left():
108  msg = Twist()
109  msg.angular.z = 0.3
110  return msg
111 
112 
113 def follow_the_wall():
114  global regions_
115 
116  msg = Twist()
117  msg.linear.x = 0.35
118  return msg
119 
120 
121 def main():
122  global pub_, active_
123 
124  rospy.init_node('reading_laser')
125 
126  pub_ = rospy.Publisher('/cmd_vel', Twist, queue_size=1)
127 
128  sub = rospy.Subscriber('/scan', LaserScan, clbk_laser)
129 
130  srv = rospy.Service('wall_follower_switch', SetBool, wall_follower_switch)
131 
132  rate = rospy.Rate(20)
133  while not rospy.is_shutdown():
134  if not active_:
135  rate.sleep()
136  continue
137  else:
138  msg = Twist()
139  if state_ == 0:
140  msg = find_wall()
141  elif state_ == 1:
142  msg = turn_left()
143  elif state_ == 2:
144  msg = follow_the_wall()
145  else:
146  rospy.logerr('Unknown state!')
147 
148  pub_.publish(msg)
149 
150  rate.sleep()
151 
152 
153 if __name__ == '__main__':
154  main()
